column1: Local Foods////The Crunchy Chicken Sandwich is out of this world. The pretzel bun really makes the sandwich. Other favorites include the egg salad
column3: and the Mintade. I usually frequent the Rice Village location
column4: but I have also been to the Upper Kirby location. Both have wonderful indoor atmosphere and friendly staff. The Rice Village location's patio leaves something to be desired with its small space
column5: but the Upper Kirby patio is beautiful.
